name: Heroes of Dungeon
description:
Heroes of Dungeon-a Game based on the mechanics of " 3 in a row"
The essence of the puzzle genre "collect three" is reduced to making groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical chips.

Heroes of Dungeon - This is the case when a seemingly ordinary puzzle challenges the player and he understands that only on his attentiveness and reaction depends on the victory.

You are waiting for adventures in the dungeon, choose one of the three characters and go on the road. On the way you will meet a lot of enemies, ranging from skeletons to dragons. Everyone has different characteristics, so you need to act quickly by collecting combinations of 3 or more identical tiles,so you hit the enemy. As you progress your character becomes stronger and learns new magic spells: You can freeze the enemy, or blow up tiles to make a big combo and deal a lot of damage to the enemy!

Features
Fun and memorable graphics
Epic music
A wide variety of enemies
